page.title: 05FARMING IN ROUD AREA
page.content: Roud area is made up of a number of farms.These are; Russells Farm, East View Farm, Berrycroft Farm and Holden Farm. Russells Farm is owned by the County Council. The farmers name is Mr. Attrill. The farm is a dairy farm and it covers 50 acres. East View Farm is also 50 acres. It is farmed by Mr. & Mrs. Broom. It is a dairy farm, the same as Russells Farm and it is owned by the County Council. Holden Farm is the largest of Roud's farms,it is not owned by the County Council. It belongs to a larger farm near Godshill called Shepherds Farm. Holden Farm has over 100 acres. The farmer is Mr. Flux. It is an arable farm. Berrycroft Farm is farmed by Mr. King. It is a dairy farm. It has 50 acres.
